The {{lang|'''Teyvat Food Notes'''|zh=提瓦特美食札记}}, originally titled ''[[The Steambird]]: Teyvat Food Notes'', is a series of blog posts on the official Chinese ''Genshin Impact'' website that gives real-life recipes for in-game [[Food]]s and sometimes, recipes for dishes or drinks that aren't yet in the game.

The blog posts are written from the perspective of "Ryuji-kun," their rendition of the male Traveler (see [[#Trivia|Trivia]]), and features interactions with each blog post's featured character(s). Blog posts are typically released on a [[character]]'s [[birthday]].

Blog posts typically feature photographs of the dish(es) being made, superimposed with official character emojis or with character merchandise placed in the photograph. Occasionally, they may also include videos of the cooking process.

==Official Description==
{|class="wikitable"
!width="45%"|Chinese
!width="65%"|Unofficial English Translation
|-
|valign="top"|{{Lang|zh=旅行者龙二君在提瓦特大陆冒险时，逐渐意识到自己果然还是痴迷于一件事情<br />
⸺这个未知世界中的食材相互碰撞究竟会产生出怎样的火花。

于是在旅途中，龙二君准备了一本专用笔记⸺用来记录所到之处的美食秘密。

蒙德城歌德大酒店的精致早点、璃月港新月轩的海味午市自助、琉璃亭的山鲜赏月宴席、万民堂的香菱特研麻辣夜宵……

地图上每新添的第一个脚印，必定是龙二君走向当地特别美食的足迹。

他会去品尝、去学习、去制作，这对他来说就是最大最具吸引力的宝藏。

而这宝藏的秘密，也都被龙二君记录在了这本笔记中，他命名⸺

'''「提瓦特美食札记」。'''|mini=1}}
|valign="top"|While adventuring across Teyvat, traveler Ryuji-kun realized there was something always on the back of his mind.<br />
&mdash;When the ingredients in this unknown world collided, what kind of sparks would they make?

On his journey, Ryuji-kun kept a special notebook for all the different culinary secrets he encountered.

The delightful breakfast at [[Mondstadt]]'s [[Goth Grand Hotel]], the fresh seafood buffet at [[Xinyue Kiosk]] in [[Liyue Harbor]], the moonlit banquets at [[Liuli Pavilion]], [[Xiangling]]'s spicy midnight snacks at the [[Wanmin Restaurant]]...

The new footprint on this map must have been Ryuji-kun's first step on his journey to sample all of this world's local specialties.

Tasting, learning, and making these foods will surely be his greatest treasure.

These secrets have been recorded in his journal, which he has dubbed&mdash;

The '''Teyvat Food Notes'''.
|}

==Trivia==
*The ''Teyvat Food Notes'' are official republications of [https://bbs.mihoyo.com/ys/collection/932 fan posts] by {{lang|mini=1|zh=厨之魂龙二|zh_tl=Kitchen Soul Ryuji}}, who is credited and referred to in the republications as {{lang|mini=1|zh=龙二君|zh_rm=Ryuji-kun}}.
**Ryuji stated that his pseudonym is derived from the ''{{w|Shonan Junai Gumi}}'' and ''{{w|Great Teacher Onizuka}}'' character {{lang|[[w:c:great-teacher-onizuka-gto:Ryuji Danma|Danma Ryuji]]|ja=弾間龍二}}.
**Ryuji previously served as a food consultant for the ''Honkai Impact 3rd'' spin-off [https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLLX1bpH-W3ZAKhXpd_elJGQRP4w4TgugT ''Cooking with Valkyries''].
*[[Eula]] was the first character to have a blog post where neither featured recipe can be cooked in-game. Chilled Tomato and Aspic Jelly Egg Roll has only been mentioned in Eula's [[Eula/Voice-Overs#Favorite Food|Favorite Food]] Voice-Over, while [[Berry & Mint Burst]] can be purchased from [[Charles]] but cannot be made in the Cooking menu.
